Key Match Events: Weston Wilson drove in the tiebreaking run with an infield single down the third-base line
Nick Castellanos homered and hit his 20th home run of the season
Zack Wheeler struck out nine batters over six innings
Pre-Game Insights: Several injured regulars out of the lineup, with players from Triple-A Lehigh Valley stepping up
Kody Clemens, Cal Stevenson, Buddy Kennedy, and Aramis Garcia contributed game-winning hits and defensive plays
Post-Match Reflections: Wilson expressed trust in the team's decision to put him in the lineup despite discomfort
Castellanos respected the apology from Rays' manager Kevin Cash for the intentional hit
Wheeler acknowledged the battle and good performance despite not having his best command
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rays' Edwin Uceta suspended for three games, later reduced to two, and manager Kevin Cash suspended for one game
Major League Baseball recognized the foul play and took action against both parties
Rays' Taylor Walls scored with an RBI single in the second inning, and Jonathan Aranda hit a solo home run in the sixth
